# Example code

## Install dependencies

```
$ npm install
```
## Test

```
$ gulp
  [22:30:46] Starting 'default'...
  [22:30:46] Finished 'default' after 9.19 ms

```

Change [src/file.js](src/file.js)

```
--------------
```
